summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.9°C) and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4734 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 10301 lux), cloud levels (up 1793 m), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 209.7m lower than yesterday, 701.0m lower than the past week, 1793.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 857.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1558.3m and 2650m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
